content: @Rick Geimer can you look at the HL7 publication checks at the top of https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/PhCP-r4/qa.html please
@Rick Geimer this also has issues with regard to publication readiness
also, the header - "PharmacistServicesAndSummariesPhCP " - we can do better than that. And the footer needs work still

@Rick Geimer getting close. You have the same name/title problem in the header that @Eric Haas and @Nagesh Bashyam were working on, and your footer needs updating per the changes made for... say patient-reported-outcomes

replace

'{{ site.data.fhir.igName }}' with '{{site.data.fhir.ig.title}}' in the header file

and that should do it assuming your ig.xml has a title element
@Sean McIlvenna Please see the notes above as we should change this for all Trifolia on FHIR generated output (for today I will hack manually).
@Grahame Grieve I believe I have addressed all the header/footer issues now. Let me know if anything else is needed.
@Rick Geimer - almost; the build still says 'CI Build' not what ballot it is
